sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Cart.css"; function Cart({ cartitems, handleadd, handleremove, handleSubmit, contact }) { const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const handleAddress = () => { setCart([...cart, address]); setAddress(""); }; const totalPrice = cartitems.reduce( (price, item) => price + item.quantity * item.price, 0 ); return ( <>

Cart Items

{cartitems.length === 0 && (

More Shoping Please Click on Home Button

)}
{cartitems.map((item) => (

Item Name : {item.name}

Item Price : {item.quantity} X ${item.price}

Quantity : {item.quantity}

))}

Total Bill = ${totalPrice}

{contact.map((contact) => (

Address : {contact.adress}

))}
Thanks for your submission.

We Will Contact You Soon.

); } export default Cart;
